name: BOSTON LOFT FARM HOUSE /LOGAN AIRPORT&TRAIN
neighborhood_overview: 5-6 min walk to the airport station. 7 min drive to Boston downtown
description:
Fist floor Apart. 2 steps at front door.Spacious 2 Bedrooms with 3 loft beds adding privacy extra space and comfort. ITS LIKE HAVING ANOTHER BEDROOM INSIDE OF A BEDROOM. 2 Amazing bathrooms ,custom designed with rock walls and hot tub. 16'ft ceilings. 6 min walk to Airport station. (Blu line) 7 min ride to Downtown Boston. 5 min to the airport. Walking distance to stores, restaurants, bars, pharmacy and parks, gym, steps away. conformable beds. Its my personal home NO PARTIES or Events.

The space
My home is beautiful, charming and cozy. It has been completely renovated from top to bottom. 16ft ceilings through the apartment. There are 2 bedrooms, each bedroom has a loft space that adds another room to the bedroom. You have total privacy and light control from loft beds.
